notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON READING PASSAGE
TOPIC: types of authority categorized by Max Weber
types of authority:
rational authority (is experienced and organized in setting up successful procedures)
traditional authority (is rightful person in line to have authority)
charismatic authority (has personal qualities that make him or her attract others)
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON LISTENING PASSAGE
TOPIC: business situation with examples of people with different kinds of authority
Corporation X has to choose one of three potentional leaders for a company it took over:
Alex = is son of previous owner, expected to take over company (has traditional authority)
Beth = works systematically, has a lot of experience, has been successful (has rational authority)
Carl = is well-liked, gets along well, is listened to, gets others to support him easily (has charismatic authority)
